info.name: QR Code SaaS Platform API - Complete Integration
info.description:
Complete API collection for testing all microservices endpoints through the API Gateway.

## ‚úÖ FULLY WORKING SYSTEM - Complete Integration Validated:

### Setup Instructions:
1. **Start Services**: `npm run dev` (starts all microservices)
2. **Database**: PostgreSQL running on Docker with complete schema including notification persistence
3. **All services are using Clean Architecture with SOLID principles**

### ‚úÖ Confirmed Working Services (End-to-End Tested):
- **API Gateway (Port 3000)** - ‚úÖ Main entry point with fixed routing
- **User Service (Port 3001)** - ‚úÖ User creation and management working
- **QR Service (Port 3002)** - ‚úÖ QR code generation with proper user ID extraction
- **Analytics Service (Port 3003)** - ‚úÖ Scan tracking and analytics
- **File Service (Port 3004)** - ‚úÖ File upload and storage
- **Notification Service (Port 3005)** - ‚úÖ Email and SMS with DATABASE PERSISTENCE

### üèóÔ∏è Clean Architecture Features:
- ‚úÖ **SOLID Principles**: Single Responsibility, Open/Closed, Liskov Substitution, Interface Segregation, Dependency Inversion
- ‚úÖ **Layered Architecture**: Interfaces ‚Üí Services ‚Üí Repositories ‚Üí Infrastructure
- ‚úÖ **Dependency Injection**: IoC container managing all dependencies
- ‚úÖ **PostgreSQL Integration**: Connection pooling, health monitoring, JSONB storage
- ‚úÖ **Database Persistence**: All notifications stored in email_messages, sms_messages, notification_templates tables
- ‚úÖ **Security**: Helmet, CORS, rate limiting, parameterized queries
- ‚úÖ **Monitoring**: Structured logging, health checks, error handling

### üß™ Testing Status (All Validated):
- ‚úÖ User Creation: Working through API Gateway
- ‚úÖ Email Notifications: Database persistence confirmed (messageId: d87dff49-74bb-4386-9596-2e4c87b8f90f)
- ‚úÖ QR Creation: Fixed user ID extraction, working with database constraints
- ‚úÖ API Gateway Routing: All services properly routed with correct ports
- ‚úÖ Database Schema: Complete with notification persistence tables
- ‚úÖ End-to-End Flow: Complete system integration validated
